precheck.title: DPIA Pre-Check
precheck.description: Quick assessment to determine if a full DPIA is required for your processing activity.

questions.q1: Will your processing involve systematic and extensive evaluation of personal aspects relating to natural persons?
questions.q2: Will your processing involve large scale processing of special categories of data or data relating to criminal convictions?
questions.q3: Will your processing involve systematic monitoring of publicly accessible areas on a large scale?
questions.q4: Will your processing involve new technologies or innovative applications?
questions.q5: Will your processing prevent data subjects from exercising their rights or accessing services?
questions.q6: Will your processing involve profiling or automated decision-making with legal or significant effects?
questions.q7: Will your processing involve vulnerable data subjects (children, employees, patients)?
questions.q8: Will your processing involve cross-border transfers outside the EU/EEA?

results.required: DPIA Required - Your processing activities indicate a high risk to individuals' rights and freedoms.
results.recommended: DPIA Recommended - While not strictly required, a DPIA would be beneficial for your processing activities.
results.notRequired: DPIA Not Required - Your processing activities appear to be low risk, but consider conducting a DPIA if circumstances change.
